channel.title: 317 connection
channel.description: Ohkay, im hosting a Pi based source, and i have one client connected to it, mine, but i try to use others but they whont, and mopar says my ip's are online, but i try'd and ip changer, and nothing....help.?

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0
item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

Im guessing you don’t have your client IP set to ‘localhost’? correct me if im wrong, i didn’t read the post’s above.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Everybody needs to use YOUR client to connect. Either that or you’ve made the starter kit something that the client does not support.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @Z-Codez Z-Codez
item.description:
@Z-Codez wrote:

Iknow this is a pointless question.
But just to make sure… Have you portforward your ip?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

But your able to log in. Common causes off the top of my head would be
Did you distribute the client correctly?
The servers connection is poor.
They are attempting to login with a different client.

There must be some kind of error printed out?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

Well, im using Pi’s source and client…changed the ip’s to mine, and uploaded the link’s, and people d load it and they can log on but imediatly disconnect…i can see their acc when they log in, but it dc’s them instantly.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Make sure to be using the correct client for that source or editing the server and client so that they are able to connect.

Did you port forward? (Assuming you did because of mopar status)

Wth is an IP changer. If you are running on localhost I am pretty sure you don’t need to enter in your ip. just enter in localhost or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

How am i not being clear, MOPAR Status checker says my ip is ONLINE, and i type my IP into a client And it WILL NOT connect It logs in and then Quickly DISCONNECT. IP changer WILL NOT even connect to it, even though MOPAR STATUS checker Says its ONLINE>…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 connection
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Can’t help if you don’t elaborate on your situation and type correctly.

Read full topic
